dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains information pertaining to shale gas plays in North America. This layer includes data for fall quarter 2012.This layer is intended to assist users in locating shale gas plays in North America and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
